GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: oss: Fix negative period/buffer sizes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.293 by commit 502e1146873d870f87da3b8f93d6bf2de5f38d0c. For more details please see the references link.
